tool_description: Pulsechain DEX Reserves of uniswap v2 compatibile exchanges (PulseX v1, PulseX v2, ...)
name: Pulsechain DEX Reserves
title: Pulsechain DEX Reserves

api_list.name: Reserves Per Pool
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pulsechain-dex-reserves1.p.rapidapi.com/reserves/0xc3a09d5d346a07e9b66ab5dcb914d48f7244a853"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pulsechain-dex-reserves1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pulsechain-dex-reserves1.p.rapidapi.com/reserves/{pool_address}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pulsechain-dex-reserves1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
